1.title: Welcome to Jumanji!

info.brief_description: A GAME FOR THOSE WHO SEEK TO FIND A WAY TO LEAVE THEIR WORLD BEHIND
info.description:
Welcome To Jumanji!
The Interactive story where all Franchises of Jumanji are welcome.
From 1995's Jumanji to The Video Game Stories to The Animated Cartoons of 1996 to 1998.

Rules:
1. If a character gets killed, the character must return to life like a video game.
2. No Inflations.
3. No weight Gain.
4. Are you Game?
